changelog.release_notes:
Version 2.4
Change Logs:
1. Update weather api according to the new policy.

Version 2.2
Change Logs:
1. Fix weather fetching issue.
2. Add current location display.

data.description:
It is a simple & clean watchface, designed by Andrian Marzal from Estudio Maba.

It is able to display Time, Date, Weekday, Battery and Bluetooth Status, and Temperature in two different styles.

It has multiple language support, which currently includes English, Spanish, Swedish, Norwegian, Italian, German, and French. More language support will be added upon request.

Hope you all enjoy it. Feel free to Email any request  and comments.
